'''Lee Harris''' (born October 16, 1981 in [[Windsor, Ontario]], [[Canada]]) is a retired [[pair skater]] who competed internationally for the United States. With partner [[Colette Appel]], he is the 2002 [[U.S. Figure Skating Championships|U.S. junior champion]]. They placed 12th at the [[2002 World Junior Figure Skating Championships]]. He now skates professionally on Royal Caribbean Cruise ships with his wife," [[Marcy Hinzmann]]. He also coaches with his wife at the Chiller Skating Rinks in Ohio.
